page.title: 01STRATFORD UPON AVON NORTH
page.content: The majority of the land cover is made up of arable farming land which offers good walks through lanes & bridleways over gently{undulating countryside.} The canal,railway & bus services provide links between the{market town} of{Stratford}in the south east & the village of{Wilmcote}in the north west & are used by local inhabitants & tourists visiting{Mary Arden's House} in Wilmcote. Stratford,famous as the birthplace of{William Shakespeare}is also the centre for livestock sales at the{cattle market}every Tuesday. This area of Stratford contains the hospital,medical centre,clinic, old people's home,secondary school & college of further education,DHSS office as well as many shops and the local motor museum. { Industrial estates}provide employment in various types of light industry.
